召.definition: to call together; to summon; to convene; temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)

召喚.definition: to summon; to beckon; to call

召回.definition: to recall (a product, an ambassador etc)

召見.definition: call in (one's subordinates); summon (an envoy of a foreign country) to an interview

召開.definition: to convene (a conference or meeting); to convoke; to call together

召陵.definition: Shaoling district of Luohe city 漯河市[Luo4 he2 shi4], Henan

召陵區.definition: Shaoling district of Luohe city 漯河市[Luo4 he2 shi4], Henan
